title: DMHO Anakapalli Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 61 Asha Worker Posts
description: The District Medical & Health Office, Anakapalli (DMHO Anakapalli) has officially released the notiifcation to fill the vacancies of 61 Asha Worker Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the DMHO Anakapalli Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
